mdRecord.dcterms:title: Collection of Five WWII-Era Postcards
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A collection of postcards that are of the mid 20th Century / WW II era. Includes a postcard of a German Officer. The donor of these postcards is unknown. However, it is believed that the donor was from Floyd County and may have been involved in WWII.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War, 1939-1945
Postcards
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
